query:
SELECT p.id
                FROM project p
                JOIN project_group_member pgm ON pgm.group_id = p.project_group_id
                WHERE p.id = $1
                AND pgm.character_id = $2
                --AND (
                --    -- TODO: replace with enum values
                --    permission & 1 = 1 OR
                --    permission & 8 = 8
                --)
